channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Three brothers cleaned out their mom’s attic — and found a $9 million Superman that just became the most expensive comic ever sold
item.description: The comic "could've easily been thrown away," one brother marveled.

item.title: Hackers Bypass Signal, Telegram And WhatsApp Encryption To Read Messages
item.description: How private and secure are your end-to-end encrypted instant messages? Not so much when Sturnus attacks.

item.title: ‘It’s a little escape’: Airport workers find refuge in airport chapels during Thanksgiving rush
item.description: “Our first customer is the airport worker," said Rev. Michael Zaniolo, the Catholic priest and administrator of the Interfaith Airport Chapels of Chic...

item.title: NYT Connections: Today’s Answers Explained (Wednesday, November 26, #899)
item.description: Not sure what today's NYT Connections answers are all about? Find out just what the different words in today's grid mean and how they fit together.

item.title: ‘I’m not going back’: Billionaire Marc Benioff says he’s switching to Google’s Gemini 3 after using ‘ChatGPT every day for three years’
item.description: Despite Salesforce’s new deal with OpenAI, Benioff is now more excited about Google’s latest offering. “It feels like the world just changed, again.”

item.title: Amazon Issues New Attack Warning For 300 Million Customers
item.description: As 300 million customers spend big during the extended Black Friday sales, Amazon has just issued an account attack warning — here’s what you need to ...

item.title: ‘The Beast In Me’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top Ten List By A New Show
item.description: Here's what new show has knocked The Beast in Me off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

item.title: City of 11,000 reels from ‘gut punch’ after Big Meat firm closes plant that employs nearly a third of the population
item.description: Amid record high beef prices, Tyson's recent moves are set to reduce beef processing capacity nationwide by 7%-9%.

item.title: Slack cofounder says employees are too bogged down by ‘fake’ work—he slams slides and pre-meetings for being ‘hyper-realistic work-like activities’
item.description: Slack and Flickr cofounder Stewart Butterfield says even CEOs and directors are guilty of doing ‘fake’ work—and it's on managers to ensure workforces ...

item.title: Nearly 1 in 4 American households living paycheck to paycheck, report reveals
item.description: A new Bank of America Institute report shows 24% of U.S. households live paycheck to paycheck in 2025, up from last year as inflation continues to out...

item.title: The Genesis Mission To Harness AI For Innovation And Security
item.description: This Genesis Mission is a bold strategic move that treats science, data, and computing as essential parts of our national strength, not optional extra...

item.title: 5 on board American Airlines flight hospitalized after odor diverts plane
item.description: American Airlines Flight 2118 was diverted to Houston, Texas, after the crew "reported fumes in the flight deck and cabin," according to the FAA.

item.title: Holiday-season stakes rise after U.S. retail sales tapered off in September
PPI indicates wholesale inflation was fairly tame before the government shutdown
Nasdaq down after Monday rally even with Alphabet sights set on $4 trillion mark
Watch your back, Apple. Alphabet’s now closing in on a $4 trillion market cap.

item.description: Car prices are nearing a historic milestone as the average cost of a new vehicle approaches $50,000, with buyers facing $766 monthly payments and risi...

item.title: Trump's $2K tariff dividends could carry a hefty price tag
item.description: Trump's $2,000 tariff dividend plan could cost $600 billion annually, far exceeding current tariff revenues of $300 billion per year, budget watchdog ...

item.title: Middle-income Americans pessimistic about their financial future amid persistent inflation, analysis shows
item.description: Study reveals only 21% of middle-income Americans expect better finances next year, down from 33% in 2020, as inflation creates widespread pessimism.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
